data.text: @PoliticsAired @NHSuk @AllisonPearson @LiamHalligan I enjoy Planet Normal but I did have a wry smile when Richard Dearlove, who so valiantly helped Tony Blair take us to war in Iraq , was lauded as a great man and worthy of the utmost respect. When he was in the firing line he was found badly wanting. #planetnormal

@PoliticsAired @NHSuk @AllisonPearson @LiamHalligan My 90 year old grandmother is in after falling and breaking her right hip.   Their policy is one visitor, once a day for one hour!   When I questioned it I was told it was because their ward was an ‘Amber’ ward and they needed to ‘protect’ their patients from Covid!!!
@sekkongboi @AllisonPearson @NHSuk @LiamHalligan Go and look at the infection severity data for Omicron.

@PoliticsAired @AllisonPearson @NHSuk @LiamHalligan I have two family@members and excellent friend nursing in the NHS, you who have no medical training think you can override the medical staffs safety. Shame on you!
